Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at a special price of $850000. We believe this offers an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a valued owner of this extraordinary creation. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
